caption.p: Amount of area projected to be suitable currently and in 2050 under three general circulation models (GCMs; a-d), and niche breadth (e) for the six species models. (a) High, (b) moderate, and (c) low suitability classes, and (d) total area deemed climatically suitable. Species-models: Ang, Sphagnum angustifolium; Fus, S. fuscum; Mag, S. magellanicum; Rub, S. rubellum; Peat, peatland; All, all species. GCMs: BCC, Beijing Climate Center Climate System Model (BCC-CSM1-1); GISS, NASA Goddard Institute for Space Studies model (GISS-E2-R); HAD, Hadley Centre Global Environmental Model (HadGEM2-ES). Note that the scale of the y-axis differs among panels.
